long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn to read a foreign language faster than ever

This extension is for people who want to improve their foreign language skills and for those who want to learn to read quickly in a foreign language.

Who is this app for?

It doesn't matter if you're learning English, or if you're learning Chinese, or if you're learning Hindi or any other foreign language. This app will help you quickly learn to read English, read Chinese, read Arabic, French, Spanish or any other language.

This extension creates automatic adaptive translation for news and articles from news resources. (in any language)
With adaptive translation you will quickly learn to read and memorize new language constructions for later use in conversation.

Don't judge strictly, this is the first version. I made the extension for myself so I could learn a new language faster. And yes, it works great for me if you read 1-2 news items every day. 

New updates will make improvements to the design and add new features. For now, it may not work correctly on all news sites. This will also be fixed in the next update.

Please send your suggestions and wishes in the comments. I will try to take into account them all.
